translations: n.加重，加权；衡量；（英）生活补贴
v.加权；称量（weight 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: One of the ways in which all agents seem to make decisions is that they assign a lower weighting to outcomes that are going to be further away in the future.
sentences.translation: 所有代理人做出决策的方式之一，似乎都是给未来远期的结果分配更低的权重。

sentences.sentence: Each question in the exam has equal weighting.
sentences.translation: 考试中每道题的分值相等。

sentences.sentence: Each of the factors is given a weighting on a scale of 1 to 10.
sentences.translation: 每种因素按1至10之间的数值加权。
